ğŸ¦ @IsraeliPM

R to @IsraeliPM: I want to tell you how deeply and from the heart we feel both our personal friendship and the friendship between our governments and our peoples. May this continue and flourish and strengthen as I'm sure it will as a result of this visit. Thank you, Narendra, and thank you all.

ğŸ¦ @IsraeliPM
